modName: Dragon Bones and Scales - Reduced Weight
summary: This mod changes your Dragon Bones/Scales weight.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#1155Cc][size=5][b]1. DESCRIPTION[/b][/size][/color]


Tired of going home multiple times just to stash your dragon bones/scales? This mod will change it!

[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]2. FEATURES[/size][/b][/color]


This mod changes dragon bones/scales weight to your custom.


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]3. CHANGELOG[/size][/b][/color]


v.1.1
          • Added: Dragon Drop - Bone.esp (from 0 to 15)
          • Added: Dragon Drop - Scales.esp (from 0 to 10)
          • Deleted: old .esp files

v1.0
          • Release


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]4. INSTALLATION[/size][/b][/color]


AUTOMATIC (with NMM):
just click DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER and after downloading install it. Then delete every .esp from rar and leave only one "Dragon Drop - Bone.esp" and "Dragon Drop - Scales.esp", which meets your expectations.

MANUAL:
choose only one "Dragon Drop - Bone.esp" and "Dragon Drop - Scales.esp" from rar and put it in <SKYRIMINSTALLFOLDER>/Data


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]5. NOTES[/size][/b][/color]


• report bugs
• comment


[color=#1155Cc][b][size=5]6. MY OTHER MODS[/size][/b][/color]
